text:
- Everything we do within
Amazon, doesn't matter your role,

and doesn't matter if
you're a solution architect,
a sales person, or anything else,

basically you are in
charge of the projects
You're in charge of the successes

of your customers, and
of your career, as well.

And I think it's really
a very diverse team,

which is another thing that
is amazing within Amazon.

I see it, also, in many other
teams in many other countries,

people that come from
a different background,

people that come from
different industries.

And it really makes
the work much more fun.
